title: Luxury Midtown 1BD/1BA - Private Balcony 24th Floor Southern Exposure!
posting_body: ['NO BROKER FEE', 'Available for a move on/after August 1st!', 'This generously proportioned 24th floor 1 bedroom/1 bathroom residence features hardwood floors, ample closet space, a balcony and oversized windows that offer excellent natural light as well as city and Hudson River views!', 'Your open-concept kitchen is outfitted with Caesarstone countertops and stainless-steel appliances including a GE dishwasher, gas range and oven, microwave and Haier refrigerator.', 'The light and bright bathroom features a Caesarstone countertop, marble walls, porcelain tile flooring and an oversized medicine cabinet for plenty of storage.', 'Symphony House features a 24-hour attended lobby, private rooftop and lounge known as the Starlight Club, an indoor atrium swimming pool and spa hot tub, fitness center and a private "green" roof deck, offering the ultimate in luxury amenities.', 'The panoramic views of Central Park, Columbus Circle and the Hudson River from the 43rd floor roof deck are spectacular.', "The building's Midtown location is one of the most desirable in Manhattan, situated near Central Park and many of the world's leading cultural venues including Lincoln Center, Carnegie Hall, Columbus Circle, Nordstrom, and Broadway theaters.", "The best of New York City's restaurants, office buildings and shopping are right at your door.", 'Magnificent Attended Lobby w/24hr Doorman & Concierge', 'Rooftop Fitness Facility with Atrium Pool and Spa Hot Tub', '9th Floor Landscaped Green Roof', '43rd Floor Furnished Roof Deck and Resident Lounge', 'Laundry Room on Every Floor', 'On-Site Parking', 'On-Site Leasing & Management']
